Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.locks.legacy

Class ConditionLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.locks.legacy.ConditionLock
  • public class ConditionLock
extends java.lang.Object
    A condition lock allows thread A to ask thread B to satisfy a condition via request(). Thread A can then wait for thread B to satisfy the condition by calling waitFor(boolean) . When thread B notices that isRequested() is true, it can begin to satisfy the condition requested from thread A. When it has successfully completed the operation, it calls satisfy() and thread A continues. The lock can be reset for re-use by calling reset() and the state of a lock can be queried at any time by calling isSatisfied().
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
